snippet.title: Mario Kart Midnight - F3 2023 Trailer - Nintendo Wii / Wii U / PC
snippet.description:
Celebrate custom tracks with Mario Kart Midnight! v1 Out NOW: https://wiki.tockdom.com/wiki/Mario_Kart_Midnight
v2 is set to release at the end of the year or early next year!

#Nintendo #MarioKartMidnight #MarioKartWii

See the tracklist: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16MJseBCS9WdVHWGsmaK_ZSIUWMvWK3JP2U-Rqgm6Qcs/edit?usp=sharing

Listen to the trailer music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7BKux0LJiAQ

Special thanks to @ZPL__, @TheGamingBram, @DemonzDay, @PanmanMusic, @Pokestir, @Cochu, @ThaddeusSilva, @TheNobleDemon, @IzzyDaRoachOfficial, @JadenMKW, @CLF78 for your contributions to the mod so far!          

Mario Kart Midnight is an UNOFFICIAL modification of Mario Kart Wii created by Mayro and @ZPL__. It cannot be purchased. Remember that modding your consoles is not without risks, and I do not take responsibility for anything that may or may not go wrong.

-----

Mario Kart Midnight uses Riivolution patches which means it can be played on a modded Wii, Wii U, or Dolphin emulator. 

On Wii or Wii U, you will first need to install the homebrew channel.
Wii modding guide: https://wii.guide/
vWii (Wii U) modding guide: https://wiiu.hacks.guide/#/vwii-modding
Riivolution: https://www.wiibrew.org/wiki/Riivolution

On Dolphin, you can right-click your game and select "start with riivolution patches". You'll need to download one of the beta builds.
Dolphin: https://dolphin-emu.org/download/

Playing online on Wii or Wii U is easy. Just go to the online menu like normal and you'll connect to the Wiimmfi custom servers. On Dolphin, you need to extract your NAND from your modded Wii or Wii U. You cannot play online on Dolphin if you do not have a Wii or Wii U. I personally struggled to get it working so I'm not sure what the best tutorial is to link. But look around and I'm sure you'll find something. Dumping the NAND on Wii U is different from on Wii which tripped me up a bit.
